tag on the next line.
First sentence of Javadoc is missing an ending period.
At-clauses have to appear in the order '[@param, @return, @throws, @deprecated]'.
Local variable name 'mDescriptor' must match pattern '^[a-z]([a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*)?$'.
